all.title: F09
all.description: Thumbprint Based Access Control Device
all.detail_description: The access control system, F09, is a professional access control product made by Granding Technology, combined with numerous features such as fingerprint recognition algorithm, optical sensors, embedded design technology, and software development kit. F09 gets maximum security and maximum value to the customers, it is one of the latest and most popular devices developed by Granding.

technical_specs.description: Composite algorithm system with high speed operating
Embedded LINUX system, easy to integrate into various system
Standalone or network environment
Professional access control system support real-time entrance logs transferring
Web server application for online solution
24 hours continuous operation available
Wired doorbell connection supported

all.title: Multibio700
all.description: Thumbprint Based Access Control Device
all.detail_description: MultiBio 700 is a new generation multiple biometric identification product. Integrating with Face, Fingerprint and PIN recognition and optional with RFID mode. It performs up to 20 verification methods all in a single device conveniently.

technical_specs.name: Display/Speaker
technical_specs.description: LCD Display: 3″ TFT Touch screen Speaker: Voice Prompt (language can be selected)

technical_specs.name: Language
technical_specs.description: Multi Language, English, French, Spanish, Arabic, Speaker: Voice Prompt (language can be selected) etc., for more than 40 languages can be selected

technical_specs.name: Technical Specifications Capacity
technical_specs.description: Face capacity: 3,000(1:1); 1500(1:N) Fingerprint capacity: 5,000; Log capacity: 100,000

technical_specs.name: Environment
technical_specs.description: Operation temperature: 0℃ ~ 45℃ Operation humidity: 20% ~ 80%

technical_specs.name: Verification/Identification
technical_specs.description: Verification speed(1:1): ≤1s Identification speed(1:N): ≤1s

technical_specs.name: Power Supply
technical_specs.description: Power: 110/220VAC ~ 12VDC (PS-3A is optional item)

technical_specs.name: Communication
technical_specs.description: TCP/IP, RS232/485, USB Host, Wiegand in, Wiegand out

technical_specs.name: Attendance status
technical_specs.description: Check in, Check out, Break in, Break out, OT in, OT out

technical_specs.name: Standand Function
technical_specs.description: High definition infrared camera; 2 user-defines function keys; Built-in relay, professional asccess control, door sensor; Dismantlement alarm, break-in alarm, duress alarm; Multi-verification mode selectable (20 modes); Scheduled bell, Workcode, SMS, T9 input, DST, Self inquiry, Photo-ID, Webserver

technical_specs.name: Customize Function
technical_specs.description: Printer output, ID reader, MIFARE reader

all.title: SC103
all.description: Hikvision 3 Megapixel high-performance CMOS Analog HD output
all.detail_description: SC103 is made with elegant design and professional surface treatment. The device have lock control, alarm, exit button, door sensor. The wiegand-in interface is used to connect external reader to construct master and slave system. Also the device can be used to connect with a control panel as a reader by wiegand-out interface. The operation can be done on the device through LCD display, also can be done on PC software and upload to the device through TCP/IP, RS232/485 communication. The USB-host is used for data download and upload, including user template and record etc.

technical_specs.name: Display/Speaker
technical_specs.description: LCD Display: 4 lines Character white LCD 128*64 Speaker: Voice Prompt (language can be selected)

technical_specs.name: Language
technical_specs.description: Multi Language, English, French, Spanish, Arabic, Speaker: Voice Prompt (language can be selected) etc., for more than 40 languages can be selected

technical_specs.name: Technical Specifications Capacity
technical_specs.description: Card capacity: 30,000 Log capacity: 50,000

technical_specs.name: Environment
technical_specs.description: Operation temperature: 0℃ ~ 45℃ Operation humidity: 20% ~ 80%

technical_specs.name: Verification/Identification
technical_specs.description: Identification speed(1:N): ≤20ms

technical_specs.name: Power Supply
technical_specs.description: Power: 110/220VAC ~ 12VDC (PS-3A is optional item)

technical_specs.name: Communication
technical_specs.description: TCP/IP, RS232/485, USB Host, Wiegand In/out

technical_specs.name: Attendance status
technical_specs.description: Check in, Check out

technical_specs.name: Standand Function
technical_specs.description: Professional access control, built-in relay, 50 time zones, 5 groups and 10 combinations; Dismantlement alarm, break-in alarm, duress alarm; door sensor; Support wired door bell connection; 9-PIN ID, Auto status, Workcode, SMS

technical_specs.name: Customize Function
technical_specs.description: Webserver, Anti-pass back, MIFARE reader

technical_specs.name: Access Mode
technical_specs.description: Card only, PIN only, Card+PIN

all.title: Central Clocks
all.description: Control your organization with centralized timekeeping solutions
all.detail_description: Timekeeping is one of the most contingent requirements of a large facility. In the modern era, central timekeepers are important installations in environments such as government offices, universities, warehouses and even large transport stations as they determine the unification of schedules throughout multiple departments and facilities.

technical_specs.description: Wireless connectivity for centralized timekeeping.
Easy maintenance and follow-up.
High quality in manufacturing using materials with a long life span.
Power options consist of direct electric current and battery use.
Time unification links all clocks synchronized to tell the same time.
Set lecture and meeting times.
Schedule operations for health sector facilities.
The possibility of connecting to the world time via GPS satellite system

all.title: Smart Building Systems
all.description: Control your organization with centralized timekeeping solutions
all.detail_description: We see the world around us in constant change and developments happening around the clock and very quickly. Hardly a day goes by without hearing about the launch of a revolutionary new device or technology. And those who work in construction are looking to provide modern buildings with a sophisticated technical nature that meets the needs of the client. Hence, the collection of all these techniques within a unified device managed by all professionally, economy and control.
